component.summary: A web app for reading the Bible with full emphasis on the God`s Word only. Sola scriptura

description.p: Read the Bible with full emphasis on God's Word only. Sola scriptura. Read God's Word with a deep understanding of His design. Bible elevates your soul with rapid ascension to calm, safety and more.

This app is built for reading the Bible on full screen. There is available such features as Bible texts of 63 translations, search, something like bookmarks, reading history, night/light theme, regulation of font size, font-family and some other small nice features. Localization for Українська, Русский, Portuguese, Español and German.
This is FOSS. Here is GitHub -=> https://github.com/Bohooslav/bain.
